home.welcomeMessage: Aspiring Full-stack and Embeded Systems Developer

work.title: Software Developer Intern
work.description: During my internship at Dischem I was exposed to the large veriaty of technologies they use to facilatate the management of inventory quantities and logistics. I worked along side their Supply Chain and Core Solutions graduate to create a platform that would facilatate the schedualing and automation of repetative SAP UI tasks.

work.title: Workshop Intern
work.description: While working in the workshop at SIS Farming Group I not only improved my basic workshop skills but also developed some system analysis and crytical problem solving skills. While working under their workshop manager I experianced firsthand the amount of time, effort and patiants it takes to gain the respect of ones subordinates and truly lead from behind.

projects.title: Screwie the Discord bot
projects.description: Skrewie is a discord bot that currently manages my Discord server and provides some entertainment when promted. In the not to distant future Screvie will also become the frontend to my home automation system providing server wide status updates to all relevant users.

projects.title: Online-CV
projects.description: This is the development build of the website you are viewing this on.

projects.title: The-Hub
projects.description: The Hub is effectivly a socket server that manages the flow of data between Skrewie, sensor nodes and other systems interacting with my home automation system

projects.title: Account System
projects.description: Account System is a project I developed for CMPG 323 subject at NWU. It provides the backend needed for the operation of a mock of the Discovery vitality app.

projects.title: Image Share
projects.description: Image Share is a project I developed for CMPG 323 subject at NWU. It allows users more easily manage and share theis images and well the their photo's metadata.

projects.title: RPA-Server
projects.description: This project was developed during my time at Dischem and forms part of the Robot Process Automation (RPA) platform we developed. The RPA-Server forms the head node of the platform and is responsable for keeping track of process progress and the processes schedual. This project also facilataes communication between the elements involved in the platform.
